Expert in utilizing ATS like JobDiva.Responsible for handling Implementation partners for direct/indirect clients.Solely responsible for managing particular MSP.Responsible for assigning and explaining requirements to other fellow recruiters.Responsible for uploading / submitting candidates on MSP. Responsible for handling end-to-end client interactions (SPOC).Responsible for generating momentum by providing consistent follow-up and feedback for managing expectations, candidate's availability status that results in a smooth hiring process.

Adept Solutions Inc. is a company formed by experienced IT professionals. Their leadership team has successfully executed multi million dollar projects early on in their career. This confidence has motivated them to start Adept Solutions in an effort to provide quality services to our clients. Our team focuses on Integrity and transparency, to avoid surprises during our client engagements.Responsibilities:I got an excellent training as an IT as well as non IT recruiter in this company.Worked on 90 percent IT and 10 percent non IT requirements.Worked directly with Implementation Partners and Direct Clients. Got training in Recruiting/Recruitment and Hiring processes including sourcing, interviewing, reference checking, tracking, salary negotiations, and closing.Used Boolean search for finding suitable candidates from portal.Sourced candidates having employment status (Green Card, Citizens, H1B, H4-EAD, F1 Opt-EAD) from job portals/Professional Sites like Monster, Dice, CareerBuilder, etc.Pooling qualified candidates for future job openings and building up the internal database of prospective candidates.Preparing of daily, weekly and monthly reports

Concentrix is a global provider of business services.Bringing both strategy and execution, they take a holistic approach to customer engagement and deploy capabilities and assets to enable improved revenue generation, customer experience and service optimization. Responsibilities:I got an excellent training on the technical aspects of television, telephone and broadband.Worked on 70 percent fault related calls and 30 percent activation related calls.Responsible for customer handlingManaging customer account wherever required.Responsible for activation of product or service on customer accountManaging average call handling time within the prescribed limitsChecking if customer’s services effected due to critical faults occurred in that area.As a part of Quickstart team, responsible for the activation of television, telephone and broadband services for the new customers.Sending technicians if unable to fix the fault.Responsible for maintaining team dataResponsible for training new employees with a team of 4 including myself and 1 SME, on various call handling skills, different kinds of faults and maintaining average call handling time.Worked closely with V&A team to train and improve efficiency for achieving customer satisfaction.

Policybazaar.com is India's leading online insurance comparison portal that has – since its inception in June, 2008 – earned for itself the trust and goodwill of over 5,000,000 customers seeking both life and non-life insurance. A 1,500+-strong team committed in providing the best-in-class insurance solutions to Indian consumers. In 2013, IAMAI awarded us as the best financial website in the country.Responsibilities:Responsible for advising / suggesting best Term Insurance plans according to the customer needs.Responsible for selling Term Insurance on phone.Fully Responsible for meeting and exceeding targets as assigned periodically.Prioritized shifts to accommodate changing demands.Ensured no losses or errors occurred while assisting customers.Responsible to work towards ensuring zero cases of mis-selling / fraud in the processes.Responsible to maintain daily / weekly / monthly reports and responding to all internal communication in a timely and effective manner.

Viplove is one of the best Recruiters I've worked with. He has a great knowledge of the recruitment business. He is not only detailed oriented but truly enthusiastic about developing and improving his skills and technical Jargon.The USP (Unique Selling Point) of Viplove is that he is the kind of Recruiter who prepares the Job Seekers with all the information they needed to have a great interview and land the position.He is always dependable and very responsive to any concerns that have been brought up, however minor they may seem. Viplove is a fine addition to any team and I would endorse him strongly in any Role that requires excellence, vision and the ability to get things done, on time, and with quality.I am sure he can make a way there, where seems to be NO WAY. I wish him Luck for all his future endeavors.

August 17, 2016, Viplove reported directly to Bhim Singh

Ridiculously efficient’ is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Bhim Singh Thakur. Few people have the opportunity to report to a Team Lead who is a coach and mentor but also someone who believe in guiding the team rather than leading as a leader because leadership is not all about leading a team it also says to guide a team—but I did when I am working for him. It is a pleasure for me to recommend him. He is working with me in the same company for last 1 year. During my ongoing tenure, I spent considerable time with Bhim. He is very much goal oriented as well as a team player, He is always driven but managed to keep her personality of being easy going. He is keenly devoted to his work, and a real people person, He is enjoyable to be around. Bhim is demonstrated from early in his tenure that he understands what business is all about. He is well organized and thrived under adversity. He keeps a sharp eye on the bottom line, but realized too that customer satisfaction is what makes or breaks your business. I suppose doing well in business is easy if you are, as he is, driven in equal measure by both quality and efficiency. In closing, let me say I have no hesitation in recommending Bhim Singh for any position pertaining to Recruitment Leadership. I can say hands down, he is an amazing leader. I feel confident he would be an asset to any organization.

summary: Experienced Senior Information Technology Recruiter with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Microsoft Word, Sales, Technical Recruiting, Screening, and Management. Strong human resources professional with a Bachelor’s Degree focused in Accounting and Business/Management from Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar University. Also, pursuing MBA in HR & Finance from SMU Distance Learning Programme.
name: Viplove Singh
title: “If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door”
